    • GameController

      public GameController(JFrame frame, int nbOfPlayer, int nbOfAI, Integer difficulty)
      The solo constructor
      Parameters:
      frame - the frame
      nbOfPlayer - the number of real player
      nbOfAI - the number of player computer
      difficulty - `null` if no ai else 1 2 or 3

      Returns:
      the GameView linked to the GameController

    • getGameId

      public int getGameId()
      Returns:
      the ID (a.k.a. the position) of the player inside the waiting room (the host is 0, next is 1 etc...)

    • getPlayerOrder

      public ArrayList<Byte> getPlayerOrder()
      Returns:
      the ArratList containing the order of the players as they joined the waiting room

      activePlayer - the active player if local

    • pickStack

    • revealPlayerCard

      public void revealPlayerCard(byte color, byte value, byte playerPosition, byte cardPosition, boolean isBlocking)
      Plays the animation of a card being reveal.
      Parameters:
      color - a byte which represents the color of the card (00 = HEART, 01 = DIAMOND, 10 = SPADE, 11 = CLUB).
      value - a byte which represents the value of the card (0000 = ACE, ... , 1101 = KING).
      playerPosition - a byte which represents a player position in GamView (0000 = player1 , ... , 1010 = player10).
      cardPosition - a a byte which represents the position of the card (00 = first card , ... , 11 = fourth card).

    • revealPlayerCard

      public void revealPlayerCard(PlayerModel player, byte playerPosition, byte cardPosition, boolean isBlocking)
      Plays the animation of a card being reveal.
      Parameters:
      player - a PlayerModel which represents the player holding the card.
      playerPosition - a byte which represents a player position in GamView (0000 = player1 , ... , 1010 = player10).
      cardPosition - a a byte which represents the position of the card (00 = first card , ... , 11 = fourth card).
      isBlocking - a a boolean which represents if animation have to block the game.

    • hidePlayerCard

      public void hidePlayerCard(byte color, byte value, byte playerPosition, byte cardPosition, boolean isBlocking)
      Plays the animation of a card being hide.
      Parameters:
      color - a byte which represents the color of the card (00 = HEART, 01 = DIAMOND, 10 = SPADE, 11 = CLUB).
      value - a byte which represents the value of the card (0000 = ACE, ... , 1101 = KING).
      playerPosition - a byte which represents a player position in GamView (0000 = player1 , ... , 1010 = player10).
      cardPosition - a a byte which represents the position of the card (00 = first card , ... , 11 = fourth card).
      isBlocking - a a boolean which represents if animation have to block the game (true to block the game, false otherwise).

    • hidePlayerCard

      public void hidePlayerCard(PlayerModel player, byte playerPosition, byte cardPosition, boolean isBlocking)
      Plays the animation of a card being hide.
      Parameters:
      player - a PlayerModel which represents the player holding the card.
      playerPosition - a byte which represents a player position in GamView (0000 = player1 , ... , 1010 = player10).
      cardPosition - a a byte which represents the position of the card (00 = first card , ... , 11 = fourth card).
      isBlocking - a a boolean which represents if animation have to block the game (true to block the game, false otherwise).

    • hidePlayerCard

      public void hidePlayerCard(CardModel card, byte playerPosition, byte cardPosition, boolean isBlocking)
      Plays the animation of a card being hide.
      Parameters:
      card - CardModel which represents the card that will be revealed.
      playerPosition - a byte which represents a player position in GamView (0000 = player1 , ... , 1010 = player10).
      cardPosition - a a byte which represents the position of the card (00 = first card , ... , 11 = fourth card).
      isBlocking - a a boolean which represents if animation have to block the game (true to block the game, false otherwise).

    • swapCard

      public void swapCard(byte player1Position, byte player2Position, byte card1Position, byte card2Position)
      Plays the animation for two card in different decks being swap.
      Parameters:
      player1Position - a byte which represents the position of the first player that initiated the switch.
      player2Position - a byte which represents the position of the second player.
      card1Position - a byte which represents the position of the card of player 1.
      card2Position - a byte which represents the position of the card of player 2.

    • putCardOnDiscard

      public void putCardOnDiscard(byte playerPosition, byte card, CardModel cardOnTop, byte colorBelow, byte valueBelow)
      Display animation for put discars card in player hand.
      Parameters:
      playerPosition - a byte which represents the position of the player.
      card - a byte which represents the position of the card.
      cardOnTop - a CardModel which represents the top card.
      colorBelow - a byte which represents the color of the below card can be -1 positionif and only if null card.
      valueBelow - a byte which represents the value of the below card can be -1 positionif and only if null card.

    • putCardOnDiscard

      public void putCardOnDiscard(PlayerModel player, byte playerPosition, byte cardPosition, CardModel cardBelow)
      Display animation for put discars card in player hand.
      Parameters:
      player - a PlayerModel which represents the player holding the card.
      playerPosition - a byte which represents the position of the player.
      cardPosition - a byte which represents the position of the card.
      cardBelow - a CardModel which represents the below card can be -1 positionif and only if null card.

    • revealLocal

      public void revealLocal()
      Reveal the card base on the game model.

    • resetLocalCardIcon

      public void resetLocalCardIcon()
      Hide all cards in local mode.

    • revealOnline

      public void revealOnline(byte[] message)
      Reveal the deck base on a message of type byte[]
      Parameters:
      message - the message

    • resetOnlineCardIcon

      public void resetOnlineCardIcon()
      Hide all cards in online mode.

    • getLocalPlayerId

      public int getLocalPlayerId(byte playerId)

    • announceTheEnd

      public void announceTheEnd()
      Announces the end of the game for the current active player. Sets the current player as the one who triggered the end and updates the view accordingly.

    • announceTheEnd

      public void announceTheEnd(byte playerId)
      Announces the end of the game for a remote player (used in client-side multiplayer). If the model is not initialized (client-only), it updates the view to show that the player with the given ID has ended the game.
      Parameters:
      playerId - the ID of the player who announced the end
      Throws:
      IllegalStateException - if the model is initialized, indicating this method should not be used server-side

    • displayRoundScore

      public void displayRoundScore(byte[] message)
      Displays the round score in a styled HTML table overlay. Parses the received message to extract player scores, sorts them in descending order, and shows the result in a LabelOverlay on the game frame.
      Parameters:
      message - the byte array containing player IDs and their scores

    • displayGameScore

      public void displayGameScore(byte hostLeft, byte winnerId, byte[] message)
      Displays the final game score in an HTML-styled table within a LabelOverlay. Highlights the winner and presents each player's total score.
      Parameters:
      winnerId - the ID of the winning player
      message - the message byte array containing player IDs and scores

    • newRound

      public void newRound()
      Prepares a new round in the online game mode. Resets all card icons, removes end-of-game indicators, re-enables game buttons, and refreshes the game interface.

    • endOfTheGame

      public void endOfTheGame()
      Handles the end-of-game logic for online mode by displaying the win/lose/draw screen. Catches and logs any exception that might occur during the display.

    • displayWRController

      public void displayWRController()
      Back to Waiting room

    • resetAndRepaintRoundedButton

      public void resetAndRepaintRoundedButton()
      Redraw with default parameter

    • repaintRoundedButton

      public void repaintRoundedButton()
      repaint rounded button
